src.description: For image addresses, it is strongly recommended to use either absolute or network paths
src.description_zh: 图片地址，强烈建议使用绝对或者网络路径

width.description: Width, in arbitrary units, and if numeric value, the default unit is px
width.description_zh: 宽度，单位任意，如果为数值，默认单位px

height.description: Height, in arbitrary units, and if numeric values, the default units are px
height.description_zh: 高度，单位任意，如果为数值，默认单位px

lazyLoad.description: Whether it is lazy to load or not, only WeChat Mini Program, App, Baidu Mini Program, and ByteDance Mini Program are effective
lazyLoad.description_zh: 是否懒加载，仅微信小程序、App、百度小程序、字节跳动小程序有效

showMenuByLongpress.description: Whether to turn on the menu of long-pressing the picture to display the recognition of the applet code, only the WeChat applet is effective
showMenuByLongpress.description_zh: 是否开启长按图片显示识别小程序码菜单，仅微信小程序有效

loadingIcon.description_zh: 加载中的图标，或者小图片

errorIcon.description: Failed to load icons, or small images
errorIcon.description_zh: 加载失败的图标，或者小图片

showLoading.description: Whether to display the loading icon or a custom slot
showLoading.description_zh: 是否显示加载中的图标或者自定义的slot

showError.description: Whether to display an icon with a loading error or a custom slot
showError.description_zh: 是否显示加载错误的图标或者自定义的slot

fade.description: Whether you need a fade-in effect

webp.description: Only network resources are supported, and only valid for WeChat Mini Programs
webp.description_zh: 只支持网络资源，只对微信小程序有效

duration.description: Transition time with fade parameters, in ms
duration.description_zh: 搭配fade参数的过渡时间，单位ms

bgColor.description: Background color, which is used to blend in with the background color when loading images on dark pages
bgColor.description_zh: 背景颜色，用于深色页面加载图片时，为了和背景色融合

slots.name: loading
slots.description: Customize the prompt content in loading
slots.description_zh: 自定义加载中的提示内容

slots.name: error
slots.description: Customize the content of the failed prompt
slots.description_zh: 自定义失败的提示内容
